actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to annuities for widows and widowers of certain railroad employees.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 making the amount payable to a widow or widower of a deceased employee under a survivor's annuity at least equal to the amount which would have been payable to such deceased employee if not deceased.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to annuities for widows and widowers of certain railroad employees.
